 Search 
 Concordia University 
 Graduate admissions 
 VIDEO PLAYLIST Let our student ambassadors show you around and get familiar with all things  Concordia . 
 This is Concordia 
 Get a bird's eye view of who we are, where we are, your paths of study and what you'll find on campus. 
   
 This is grad studies 
 Welcome to a dynamic, diverse community of graduate students in a city rich with opportunities for research. 
 Where you'll be 
 Allow us to introduce you to our two campuses – Sir George Williams and Loyola – and see how easy it is to get around by shuttle bus, metro or bicycle. 
 Where you'll learn, study & create 
 A closer look at learning resources, engineering labs, art studios and study spaces that Concordia students enjoy. 
 Where you’ll access campus services 
 Attend an orientation session to get aquainted with the range of services for Concordia students – and how they can make your life easier. 
 How you’ll take your learning to the next level 
 An overview of the extra-curricular activities offered beyond the classroom: sports, culture, arts and more. 
 Back to top
